# Tender Announcement for Snow Removal Work on Roads and Parking Lots

## Project No. VR552411_80668

### Description

The [Defence Construction Canada - Region of Quebec](https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/contract-activity) seeks bids for Snow Removal Work on Roads and Parking Lots at the Valcartier Garrison in Quebec.

The work includes clearing, de-icing, and disposing of snow and ice from roads, parking lots, and parking lot rain grates.

**Project Details**

* Location: Valcartier Garrison, QC, Canada
* Contract Type: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Language of the solicitation: English and French
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Expected Contract Date: Please see tender documents for details
* Estimated Cost: $5,730,000.00 for a period of 2 years with the possibility of additional 3 years

## Tender Documents

Tender documents are available on the [MERX website](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2576380412/abstract?language=EN) for a fee.

## Site Visit

A site visit has been scheduled for August 22, 2023, at the Valcartier Garrison (QC) G0A 4Z0.

## Bidding and Contract Award

Bidding and contract award details are available on the [MERX website](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2576380412/abstract?language=EN). 

## Contact Information

For more information or to submit an offer, please contact the [Defence Construction Canada Contracting Authority](https://dcc-cdc.gc.ca/contract-activity) as listed in this announcement. 

**Important Note:** All inquiries and questions should be directed to the contracting authority, and any others can lead to disqualification of the bidder. 

Also, please note that the preliminary tender results for this project will be available on MERX. 

The contact information for Defence Construction Canada Contracting Authority is as follows:
